Description: TAP Stack - Task Assignment Platform CloudFormation Template

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Environment suffix for resource naming (e.g., dev, staging, prod)

PublicSubnet1CIDR.Description: CIDR block for the public subnet in the first Availability Zone

PublicSubnet2CIDR.Description: CIDR block for the public subnet in the second Availability Zone

PublicSubnet3CIDR.Description: CIDR block for the public subnet in the third Availability Zone

PrivateSubnet1CIDR.Description: CIDR block for the private subnet in the first Availability Zone

PrivateSubnet2CIDR.Description: CIDR block for the private subnet in the second Availability Zone

PrivateSubnet3CIDR.Description: CIDR block for the private subnet in the third Availability Zone

DBName.ConstraintDescription: must begin with a letter and contain only alphanumeric characters.

DBUser.ConstraintDescription: must begin with a letter and contain only alphanumeric characters.

DBClass.ConstraintDescription: must select a valid database instance type.

BastionInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

AppInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

BastionAllowedCIDR.Description: CIDR block allowed to SSH to the bastion host
BastionAllowedCIDR.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

LatestAmiId.Description: Latest Amazon Linux 2 AMI ID from SSM Parameter Store

SSLCertificateARN.Description: ARN of the SSL certificate for HTTPS
SSLCertificateARN.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid certificate ARN.

Properties.AlarmDescription: Alarm if CPU exceeds 75% for 5 minutes
Alarm if RDS CPU exceeds 80% for 5 minutes

LoadBalancerDNS.Description: DNS name of the load balancer

FlowLogsBucketName.Description: Name of the S3 bucket for VPC flow logs
